attributes.name: Interanual variability
attributes.description: Interannual variability measures the variability in water supply from year to year.

attributes.name: World prices for major commodity crops
attributes.description: These estimates represent prices for the major commodity crops when global production meets global demand.

attributes.name: Country geometries
attributes.description: GADM is a spatial database of the location of the world's administrative areas (or adminstrative boundaries) for use in GIS and similar software. Administrative areas in this database are countries and lower level subdivisions such as provinces, departments, counties, etc. GADM describes where these administrative areas are (the spatial features), and for each area it provides some attributes, such as the name and variant names.

attributes.name: Water Risk - Groundwater table declining trend
attributes.description: Measures trends in the decline of the groundwater table. The slope of the decline correlates to the severity of the trend. Baseline values are generated using hydrological modeling from 1990 to 2014.

attributes.name: Water Risk - Drought severity (soil moisture)
attributes.description: Estimates the average magnitude of droughts based on the severity and frequency of periods of time during which soil moisture remains low. Baseline values are generated using hydrological modeling of long-term trends from 1960 to 2014.

attributes.name: Average global change in seasonal variability for rainfed crops through 2040
attributes.description: This figure displays the average seasonal variability score (0-5) of water in areas in which selected crops are grown. This only includes rainfed growing areas.

attributes.name: Projected percentage of crop area by level of water stress and volume of demand
attributes.description: This figure displays the percent of all irrigated crop area facing each level of water stress (vertical axis) and the volume of the demand (width of bars) for maize, rice, soybean, and wheat for the year selected.

attributes.name: Crops
attributes.description: These crops were selected based on their importance in the global commodities market and for food security. 'All crops' represent all of the crops that are included in the tool as displayed in the menu. Pixels are shaded if they contain at least 10 hectares of crop area within the 10x10 km pixel. If there are multiple crops meeting this criteria per pixel, the predominant crop (based on production) is displayed. If a single crop is selected, and the pixel colors are shaded by level of production. The crop layers displayed on the map reflect 2005 data regardless of the timeframe selected.

attributes.name: Average global change in water stress for irrigated crops through 2040
attributes.description: This figure displays the average water stress score (0-5) of areas in which the selected irrigated crops are grown.

attributes.name: Kilocalories per capita in [Country] in [year]
attributes.description: This figure displays the selected country's average availability of kilocalories per person per day, benchmarked against a globally applied minimum requirement to prevent malnourishment (FAO 1996).

attributes.name: Projected volume of crop production, demand for food, and net trade in [Country] in [year]
attributes.description: This figure displays annual domestic production, demand for food, and net trade for the crop and timeframe selected.

attributes.name: Percentage of global crop area that is irrigated vs. rainfed
attributes.description: This figure displays the share of land that is irrigated versus rainfed for the selected crop(s) and country.

attributes.name: Water Risk - Water stress
attributes.description: Measures the ratio of total annual water withdrawals to total available annual renewable supply, accounting for upstream consumptive use. Higher values indicate less water availability and more competition among users. Baseline values are generated using hydrological modeling of long-term trends from 1960 to 2014.

attributes.name: Percentage of global [crop] area that is irrigated vs. rainfed
attributes.description: This figure displays the share of harvested land that is irrigated versus rainfed for the selected crop(s) and timeframe.

attributes.name: Change over time in irrigated {{crop_name}} area exposed to water stress and rainfed {{crop_name}} area exposed to seasonal variability in {{countryName}}
attributes.description: This figure measures the projected change over time in water stress to irrigated crop area and seasonal variability to rainfed crop area for the selected crop and country.

attributes.name: Water Risk - Inter-annual variability
attributes.description: Measures the variability in water supply from year to year. It is an indicator of the unpredictability of supply. Baseline values are generated using hydrological modeling of long-term trends from 1960 to 2014.

attributes.name: Water Risk - Groundwater stress
attributes.description: Measures the relative ratio of groundwater withdrawal to recharge rate. Values above one indicate that groundwater is being depleted faster than it is being restored. Unsustainable groundwater consumption could affect groundwater availability and groundwater-dependent ecosystems. Baseline values are generated using hydrological modeling of long-term trends from 1990 to 2014.

attributes.name: Top 5 net importers and net exporters
attributes.description: This figure displays the top 5 net exporting and net importing countries for the selected crop and timeframe.

attributes.name: Water Risk - Seasonal variability
attributes.description: Measures the variation in water supply between months of the year. Areas with high seasonal variability may have extreme wet and/or dry seasons. Baseline values are generated using hydrological modeling of long-term trends from 1960 to 2014.

attributes.name: Top 5 countries with the greatest projected irrigated yield increases through [year]
attributes.description: This figure displays the top 5 countries with the greatest projected yield increases for irrigated area of the selected crop. The bars are shaded according to the amount of production facing various levels of water stress.

attributes.name: Top 10 countries with the highest water stress scores for selected crop
attributes.description: Water stress for the selected crop is calculated using a weighted (by harvested area) average of the irrigated crop's exposure to water stress.

attributes.name: Top 10 countries with the highest [crop] drought severity risk scores
attributes.description: Drought risk for the selected crop is calculated using a weighted (by harvested area) average of the rainfed crop area's exposure to drought risk.

attributes.name: Change in net trade over time for top 5 crops in highest demand in {{countryName}}
attributes.description: This figure displays the change over time in net trade for the 5 crops in highest demand in the country selected.

attributes.name: Global [crop] yield, area, production, price, and demand change over time
attributes.description: This figure displays global trends over time for the selected crop's yield, area, production, price, and demand.

attributes.name: [Crop] yield, area, production, and demand change over time in [Country]
attributes.description: This figure displays the change in the selected country's net trade of the selected crop over time.

attributes.name: [Crop] yield, area, production, and demand change over time in [Country]
attributes.description: This figure displays domestic trends over time for the selected country of crop yield, area, production, and demand.

attributes.name: Projected percentage of all crop production area by water risk in [Country] in [year]
attributes.description: This figure displays the percentage of crop production by level of water risk for the timeframe selected.

attributes.name: Percentage of global crop production area by water risk
attributes.description: This figure displays the percentage of global crop production by level of water risk for the timeframe selected. Note that drought severity and groundwater table decline are categorized into slightly different risk categories than the other indicators. See 'WRI Aqueduct 2019' technical note.

attributes.name: Percentage of global [crop] production area by water risk
attributes.description: This figure displays the percentage of global crop production by level of water risk for the timeframe selected.
This figure displays the percentage of crop production by level of water risk for the timeframe and crop selected.

attributes.name: Crops
attributes.description: "All crops" represent all of the crops that are included in the tool as displayed in the menu. Pixels are shaded if they contain at least 10 hectares of crop area within the 10x10 km pixel. If there are multiple crops meeting this criteria per pixel, the predominant crop (based on production) is displayed. If a single crop is selected, and the pixel colors are shaded by level of production. The crop layers displayed on the map reflect 2005 data regardless of the timeframe selected.

Water stress measures the ratio of total water withdrawals to available renewable surface and groundwater supplies. Water withdrawals include domestic, industrial, irrigation, and livestock consumptive and nonconsumptive uses. Available renewable water supplies include the impact of upstream consumptive water users and large dams on downstream water availability. Higher values indicate more competition among users.

Total crop production represents crop area harvested * yield, by country. Note that production represents total production of a crop, not just for human consumption but also for livestock feed, biofuels, etc.
Food demand for crop represents aggregate household food demand for the selected crop(s), by country.
Crop net trade represents the amount of the selected crop(s) that is traded by country, where positive values indicate greater exports than imports.
Kilocalories per person represents the average availability of calories per person, by country. Note that it is not crop specific.
Pop. at risk of hunger represents the percentage of each country's population at risk of suffering from malnourishment. Note that it is not crop specific.

attributes.name: Percentage of global crop production area by drought risk
attributes.description: This figure displays the percentage of global crop production by level of water risk for the timeframe selected. Note that drought severity and groundwater table decline are categorized into slightly different risk categories than the other indicators. See 'WRI Aqueduct 2019' technical note.

attributes.name: Projected percentage of all crop production area by drought risk in [Country] in [year]
attributes.description: This figure displays the percentage of crop production by level of drought risk for the timeframe selected.

attributes.name: Percentage of global [crop] production area by drought risk
attributes.description: This figure displays the percentage of crop production by level of drought risk for the timeframe selected.
This figure displays the percentage of crop production by level of drought risk for the timeframe selected.

attributes.name: Percentage of global crop production area by drought risk
attributes.description: This figure displays the percentage of global crop production by level of water risk for the timeframe selected. Note that drought severity and groundwater table decline are categorized into slightly different risk categories than the other indicators. See 'WRI Aqueduct 2019' technical note.

attributes.name: Projected percentage of all crop production area by groundwater table decline in [Country] in [year]
attributes.description: This figure displays the percentage of crop production by level of groundwater table decline for the timeframe selected.

attributes.name: Percentage of global [crop] production area by groundwater table decline
attributes.description: This figure displays the percentage of crop production by level of groundwater table decline for the timeframe selected.
This figure displays the percentage of crop production by level of groundwater table decline for the timeframe selected.
